lead_paragraph: Four members of the British Navy have been charged with sexual assault in connection with an attack that took place in Nova Scotia on April 10.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: 4 in British Navy Are Charged
headline.main: Canada: 4 in British Navy Are Charged

snippet: Four members of the British Navy have been charged with sexual assault in connection with an attack that took place in Nova Scotia on April 10.
abstract: Four members of British Navy hockey team are charged with sexual assault in connection with attack at party in Nova Scotia involving Halifax-area woman.
